original_title: Model Railways: How to Build a Model Railway
overview: Learn the arts of building a model railway layout, from a baseboard construction for running trains at three levels right through to the detailing of scenic dressings and coverings. Dave Lowry constructs his own design of 'N' gauge layout, from off the shelf track, scenic materials and ready-to-run locos and stock. This program will inspire and encourage the modeler, providing enjoyment for all.
title: Model Railways: How to Build a Model Railway
